desc: Sets the icon of a workspace.

token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

team_id.desc: ID for the workspace to set the icon for.

failed_to_set_icon.desc: Setting the url in the database failed. This may be transient, please try again soon.

feature_not_enabled.desc: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.

invalid_auth.desc: The given token is not authorized for the requested `team_id`.

not_an_admin.desc: This method is only accessible by org owners and admins.
